      Methods in org.apache.drill.exec.store.security that return CredentialsProvider 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static CredentialsProvider CredentialProviderUtils.getCredentialsProvider(String username, String password, CredentialsProvider credentialsProvider)
      Returns specified CredentialsProvider credentialsProvider if it is not null or builds and returns PlainCredentialsProvider with specified USERNAME and PASSWORD.
